title: PM Modi in Jordan: To hold talks with King Abdullah II; what's at stake

He will then visit Ethiopia, a key African Union hub, to bolster bilateral relations and address Parliament. The tour concludes in Oman, aiming to deepen their strategic partnership and economic ties, with engagements including diaspora meetings.

title: BMC polls on Jan 15, results on Jan16; voting for 29 civic bodies across Maharashtra
description: Maharashtra will hold elections for 29 municipal corporations, including the BMC, on January 15, with results on January 16. This announcement follows a significant delay due to legal issues and reservation concerns. The polls, covering major cities like Mumbai, Pune, and Nagpur, are seen as a crucial political test for parties ahead of future state-level contests.

title: Rupee sinks further, hits new all-time low of 90.74 vs dollar
description: The Indian rupee hit a fresh all-time low of 90.74 against the US dollar, pressured by uncertainty over an India-US trade deal and continued foreign fund outflows. Despite positive macro cues, the rupee struggled as importers' strong dollar demand and risk-averse sentiment dominated. Experts see a bullish near-term bias for the USD-INR pair.

title: 'If he does not perform': Ashwin issues blunt review as Gill struggles in T20Is
description: Shubman Gill's recent batting struggles have put India's T20 World Cup plans in a bind. With only seven T20Is left, the vice-captain's form is under scrutiny, intensifying debate over Sanju Samson's potential inclusion. Former spinner Ravichandran Ashwin urges a fair review, highlighting the difficulty of dropping a vice-captain while stressing the need for impactful batting.

title: RBI repo rate cut: Prepay your home loan now to save interest outgo; here’s how

A misguided attempt by a VIP to secure an autograph sparked concerns for safety, forcing an early departure for the soccer legend.

title: Drums, conch shells and saffron flags: Pankaj Chaudhary takes UP BJP charge; is 7-time MP
description: Pankaj Chaudhary, a seven-time MP, was formally appointed as the new Uttar Pradesh BJP chief in Lucknow amidst a grand 'Sangathan Parva' event. Union Minister Piyush Goyal announced the decision, highlighting the party's focus on social inclusivity with diverse representation on the dais. The ceremony saw massive worker turnout, underscoring Chaudhary's organizational strength.

title: Where Does Auston Matthews Live? Inside Leafs Star’s Homes and Wealth
description: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: Vanessa Bryant emotional as UConn, USC honour Kobe and Gigi in on-court tribute
description: The UConn Huskies beat the USC Trojans by 28 points. The game became emotional as players honored Kobe and Gigi Bryant. Both teams wore different Kobe sneakers. Vanessa Bryant shared pictures of the athletes on her Instagram. This tribute highlighted the lasting impact of Kobe and Gigi on basketball. Gigi had wished to play for UConn.

title: Quote of the day by Nikola Tesla: 'Life is and will ever remain an equation'
description: Nikola Tesla, a brilliant inventor, revolutionized modern technology with his work in electricity and wireless communication. Despite personal struggles, his visionary ideas continue to inspire. Tesla viewed life as an unsolvable equation, yet emphasized the importance of known factors like scientific principles and experience to navigate its mysteries with curiosity and purpose.

title: MLB: Atlanta Braves looking to acquire $325 million Texas Rangers superstar
description: Atlanta Braves are reportedly exploring a blockbuster trade for Texas Rangers star Corey Seager, a move that could significantly alter the NL playoff landscape. Despite Seager's hefty contract and a no-trade clause, the Braves see him as a crucial solution for their shortstop woes. This potential deal offers Atlanta elite offense and Texas a chance to rebuild their farm system.

title: NHL Update: Connor McDavid reacts to Oilers trading Skinner, Kulak
description: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
description: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.
